detectors.description:
AuricRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#857-875) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#866)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#869)

[AuricRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#L857-L875) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#L869)

detectors.description:

		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#779)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#842)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#778)

		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#781)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#842)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PoolEscrow.sol#782)
